data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Brest you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brest, Belarus

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Brest, Belarus to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Brest, Belarus be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Brest to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tatar people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 235,133 believers in Brest, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help 2,800 new simple churches start among the 14,000,000 people in the state of Brest, Belarus. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 235,133 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

location.name: Brest
location.people_groups_list: Estonian, Bashkir, Uzbek, Southern, Korean, Georgian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Estonian (800), Bashkir (1,200), Uzbek, Southern (3,500), Korean (1,000), Georgian (2,900)
